topic: Impact of cognitive biases on renewable energy adoption
content: Generated from lens processing: My working hypothesis is that shuffling prompts can lead to the emergence of innovative questions and insights by breaking the routine of linear thinking. As a next step, I will set aside time to randomly shuffle a set of my existing prompts and observe the new combinations that arise. I will document any novel perspectives or ideas that emerge, paying attention to how my current context or cognitive biases might influence my interpretations.

metadata.trigger: If I shuffled my own prompts, what new ones emerge?
